quote: Do not let your hearts be troubled. Trust in God; trust also in me.
author: Jesus Christ

quote: Sir, my concern is not whether God is on our side; my greatest concern is to be on God's side, for God is always right.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: Coincidence is God's way of remaining anonymous.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: God has given us two hands, one to receive with and the other to give with.
author: Billy Graham

quote: Disappointment is inevitable. But to become discouraged, there's a choice I make. God would never discourage me. He would always point me to himself to trust him. Therefore, my discouragement is from Satan. As you go through the emotions that we have, hostility is not from God, bitterness, unforgiveness, all of these are attacks from Satan.
author: Charles Stanley

quote: My trust in God flows out of the experience of his loving me, day in and day out, whether the day is stormy or fair, whether I'm sick or in good health, whether I'm in a state of grace or disgrace. He comes to me where I live and loves me as I am.
author: Brennan Manning

quote: Life is God's novel. Let him write it.
author: Isaac Bashevis Singer

quote: I just want to do God's will. And he's allowed me to go to the mountain. And I've looked over, and I've seen the promised land! I may not get there with you, but I want you to know tonight that we as a people will get to the promised land.
author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote: God has given you one face, and you make yourself another.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Some of God's greatest gifts are unanswered prayers.
author: Garth Brooks

quote: Men must be governed by God or they will be ruled by tyrants.
author: William Penn

quote: Every child comes with the message that God is not yet discouraged of man.
author: Rabindranath Tagore

quote: Never trust anyone completely but God. Love people, but put your full trust only in God.
author: Lawrence Welk

quote: Every morning I wake up and thank God.
author: Aaron Neville

quote: For prayer is nothing else than being on terms of friendship with God.
author: Saint Teresa of Avila

quote: We need to find God, and he cannot be found in noise and restlessness. God is the friend of silence. See how nature - trees, flowers, grass- grows in silence; see the stars, the moon and the sun, how they move in silence... We need silence to be able to touch souls.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: People see God every day, they just don't recognize him.
author: Pearl Bailey

quote: Not only does God play dice, but... he sometimes throws them where they cannot be seen.
author: Stephen Hawking

quote: God meets daily needs daily. Not weekly or annually. He will give you what you need when it is needed.
author: Max Lucado

quote: God gave you a gift of 86,400 seconds today. Have you used one to say 'thank you?'
author: William Arthur Ward

quote: God never ends anything on a negative; God always ends on a positive.
author: Edwin Louis Cole

quote: Laughter is God's blessing.
author: Joseph Prince

quote: One and God make a majority.
author: Frederick Douglass

quote: The best remedy for those who are afraid, lonely or unhappy is to go outside, somewhere where they can be quiet, alone with the heavens, nature and God. Because only then does one feel that all is as it should be.
author: Anne Frank

quote: Start living now. Stop saving the good china for that special occasion. Stop withholding your love until that special person materializes. Every day you are alive is a special occasion. Every minute, every breath, is a gift from God.
author: Mary Manin Morrissey

quote: While I know myself as a creation of God, I am also obligated to realize and remember that everyone else and everything else are also God's creation.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: Heaven means to be one with God.
author: Confucius

quote: I believe God is managing affairs and that He doesn't need any advice from me. With God in charge, I believe everything will work out for the best in the end. So what is there to worry about.
author: Henry Ford

quote: God is the tangential point between zero and infinity.
author: Alfred Jarry

quote: Praise God, from whom all blessings flow! Praise Him, all creatures here below! Praise Him above, ye heavenly host! Praise Father, Son, and Holy Ghost!
author: Thomas Ken

quote: Young man, young man, your arm's too short to box with God.
author: James Weldon Johnson

quote: God used beautiful mathematics in creating the world.
author: Paul Dirac

quote: What God intended for you goes far beyond anything you can imagine.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: There is no place in my soul, no corner of my character, where God is not.
author: Evelyn Underhill

quote: God will not permit any troubles to come upon us, unless He has a specific plan by which great blessing can come out of the difficulty.
author: Peter Marshall

quote: I don't stand for the black man's side, I don' t stand for the white man's side. I stand for God's side.
author: Bob Marley

quote: Trust in God - she will provide.
author: Emmeline Pankhurst

quote: I sometimes think that God in creating man somewhat overestimated his ability.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: If God had wanted me otherwise, He would have created me otherwise.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: God and Nature first made us what we are, and then out of our own created genius we make ourselves what we want to be. Follow always that great law. Let the sky and God be our limit and Eternity our measurement.
author: Marcus Garvey

quote: God is bigger than people think.
author: Jimmy Dean

quote: God is a verb, not a noun.
author: R. Buckminster Fuller

quote: Where mercy, love, and pity dwell, there God is dwelling too.
author: William Blake

quote: My walk on the moon lasted three days. My walk with God will last forever.
author: Charles Duke

quote: Your God is ever beside you - indeed, He is even within you.
author: Alphonsus Liguori

quote: I think that anything that begins to give people a sense of their own worth and dignity is God.
author: John Shelby Spong

quote: God has entrusted me with myself.
author: Epictetus

quote: Sometimes God writes straightforward in twisted lines.
author: Gloria Trevi

quote: I believe in God, but not as one thing, not as an old man in the sky. I believe that what people call God is something in all of us. I believe that what Jesus and Mohammed and Buddha and all the rest said was right. It's just that the translations have gone wrong.
author: John Lennon

quote: God sent Jesus as an example to see if we could retain and maintain the Holy Spirit in human flesh.
author: Benny Hinn

quote: What I see in the Bible, especially in the book of Psalms, which is a book of gratitude for the created world, is a recognition that all good things on Earth are God's, every good gift is from above. They are good if we recognize where they came from and if we treat them the way the Designer intended them to be treated.
author: Philip Yancey

quote: I cannot think that we are useless or God would not have created us. There is one God looking down on us all. We are all the children of one God. The sun, the darkness, the winds are all listening to what we have to say.
author: Geronimo

quote: We should always look upon ourselves as God's servants, placed in God's world, to do his work; and accordingly labour faithfully for him; not with a design to grow rich and great, but to glorify God, and do all the good we possibly can.
author: David Brainerd

quote: God made the world round so we would never be able to see too far down the road.
author: Karen Blixen

quote: Cast your cares on God; that anchor holds.
author: Frank Moore Colby

quote: God's truth judges created things out of love, and Satan's truth judges them out of envy and hatred.
author: Dietrich Bonhoeffer

quote: God is in the sadness and the laughter, in the bitter and the sweet.
author: Neale Donald Walsch

quote: Start with God - the first step in learning is bowing down to God; only fools thumb their noses at such wisdom and learning.
author: King Solomon

quote: What ever disunites man from God, also disunites man from man.
author: Edmund Burke

quote: They always win who side with God.
author: Frederick William Faber
